è·å–å’Œä¿®æ”¹å¯¹è±¡çš„å±æ€§å€¼ï¼š

é€šè¿‡åå°„æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å®ç°åœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶åŠ¨æ€åœ°æ“ä½œç±»çš„å±æ€§ã€æ–¹æ³•ã€æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•ç­‰ï¼Œå…·æœ‰å¾ˆé«˜çš„çµæ´»æ€§å’Œæ‰©å±•æ€§ï¼Œä½†åŒæ—¶ä¹Ÿéœ€è¦æ³¨æ„åå°„æœºåˆ¶çš„ä½¿ç”¨å®‰å…¨é—®é¢˜ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ç§æœ‰å±æ€§ã€æ–¹æ³•çš„è®¿é—®æƒé™ã€ç±»å‹è½¬æ¢ç­‰é—®é¢˜ã€‚

              • çº¿ç¨‹çš„åˆ›å»ºå’Œå¯åŠ¨ï¼šå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ç»§æ‰¿Threadç±»æˆ–å®ç°Runnableæ¥å£æ¥åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹ï¼Œå¹¶é€šè¿‡è°ƒç”¨start()æ–¹æ³•æ¥å¯åŠ¨çº¿ç¨‹ã€‚

              • çº¿ç¨‹åŒæ­¥å’Œäº’æ–¥ï¼šå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨synchronizedå…³é”®å­—æ¥å®ç°çº¿ç¨‹åŒæ­¥å’Œäº’æ–¥ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ä½¿ç”¨Lockæ¥å£å’ŒConditionæ¥å£è¿›è¡Œæ›´åŠ çµæ´»çš„çº¿ç¨‹åŒæ­¥å’Œäº’æ–¥æ“ä½œã€‚å¦å¤–ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨volatileå…³é”®å­—æ¥ä¿è¯å¤šçº¿ç¨‹ä¹‹é—´çš„å¯è§æ€§ã€‚

              • public class Counter {
    private int count; // è®¡æ•°å™¨
    
    // å¢åŠ è®¡æ•°å™¨çš„å€¼
    public synchronized void increment() {
        count++;
    }
    
    // å‡å°‘è®¡æ•°å™¨çš„å€¼
    public synchronized void decrement() {
        count--;
    }
    
    // è·å–è®¡æ•°å™¨çš„å€¼
    public int getCount() {
        return count;
    }
}
    
public class CounterThread extends Thread {
    private Counter counter; // è®¡æ•°å™¨å¯¹è±¡
    
    // æ„é€ æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä¼ å…¥è®¡æ•°å™¨å¯¹è±¡
    public CounterThread(Counter counter) {
        this.counter = counter;
    }
    
    // çº¿ç¨‹æ‰§è¡Œçš„æ–¹æ³•
    public void run() {
        for (int i = 0; i < 10000; i++) {
            counter.increment(); // å¢åŠ è®¡æ•°å™¨çš„å€¼
        }
    }
}
    
public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) throws InterruptedException {
        Counter counter = new Counter(); // åˆ›å»ºè®¡æ•°å™¨å¯¹è±¡
        CounterThread thread1 = new CounterThread(counter); // åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹1ï¼Œä¼ å…¥è®¡æ•°å™¨å¯¹è±¡
        CounterThread thread2 = new CounterThread(counter); // åˆ›å»ºçº¿ç¨‹2ï¼Œä¼ å…¥è®¡æ•°å™¨å¯¹è±¡
    
        thread1.start(); // å¯åŠ¨çº¿ç¨‹1
        thread2.start(); // å¯åŠ¨çº¿ç¨‹2
    
        thread1.join(); // ç­‰å¾…çº¿ç¨‹1æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ¯•
        thread2.join(); // ç­‰å¾…çº¿ç¨‹2æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ¯•
    
        System.out.println(counter.getCount()); // è¾“å‡ºè®¡æ•°å™¨çš„å€¼
    }
}
Counterç±»è¡¨ç¤ºä¸€ä¸ªè®¡æ•°å™¨ï¼ŒåŒ…å«äº†increment()å’Œdecrement()æ–¹æ³•ç”¨äºå¢åŠ å’Œå‡å°‘è®¡æ•°å™¨çš„å€¼ï¼Œä»¥åŠgetCount()æ–¹æ³•ç”¨äºè·å–è®¡æ•°å™¨çš„å€¼ã€‚åœ¨CounterThreadç±»ä¸­ï¼Œé€šè¿‡è°ƒç”¨increment()æ–¹æ³•æ¥å¢åŠ è®¡æ•°å™¨çš„å€¼ã€‚åœ¨Mainç±»ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ›å»ºäº†ä¸¤ä¸ªCounterThreadçº¿ç¨‹å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå¹¶å¯åŠ¨å®ƒä»¬ï¼Œæœ€åé€šè¿‡join()æ–¹æ³•ç­‰å¾…å®ƒä»¬æ‰§è¡Œå®Œæ¯•ï¼Œå¹¶è¾“å‡ºè®¡æ•°å™¨çš„å€¼ã€‚
    
åœ¨increment()å’Œdecrement()æ–¹æ³•ä¸­ï¼ŒåŠ ä¸Šäº†synchronizedå…³é”®å­—ï¼Œç”¨äºä¿è¯çº¿ç¨‹åŒæ­¥å’Œäº’æ–¥ï¼Œé¿å…å¤šä¸ªçº¿ç¨‹åŒæ—¶ä¿®æ”¹è®¡æ•°å™¨çš„å€¼ã€‚

public class MessagePrinter {
    private MessageService messageService;
    
    public void setMessageService(MessageService messageService) {
        this.messageService = messageService;
    }
    
    public void printMessage() {
        System.out.println(messageService.getMessage());
    }
}
åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥çš„æ–¹å¼å°†MessageServiceå¯¹è±¡æ³¨å…¥åˆ°äº†MessagePrinterå¯¹è±¡ä¸­ï¼Œä½¿å¾—MessagePrinterå¯ä»¥è°ƒç”¨MessageServiceå¯¹è±¡çš„getMessage()æ–¹æ³•æ¥è·å–æ¶ˆæ¯å¹¶è¾“å‡ºã€‚é€šè¿‡è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼ï¼Œå¯¹è±¡ä¹‹é—´çš„å…³ç³»æ›´åŠ æ¸…æ™°ã€æ˜“äºç»´æŠ¤ã€‚

        System.out.println(messageService.getMessage());
    }

åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨@Componentæ³¨è§£æ ‡è®°MessagePrinterç±»ä¸ºSpringç»„ä»¶ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶ä½¿ç”¨@Autowiredæ³¨è§£æ ‡è®°messageServiceå±æ€§éœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥ã€‚å½“Springå®¹å™¨åˆ›å»ºMessagePrinterå¯¹è±¡æ—¶ï¼Œä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å°†messageServiceå±æ€§æ³¨å…¥åˆ°å®ƒä¸­ã€‚é€šè¿‡è¿™ç§æ–¹å¼ï¼Œå¯¹è±¡ä¹‹é—´çš„å…³ç³»æ›´åŠ æ¸…æ™°ã€æ˜“äºç»´æŠ¤ã€‚

              • é”€æ¯ï¼šSpringå®¹å™¨é”€æ¯Beanå®ä¾‹æ—¶è°ƒç”¨Beançš„é”€æ¯æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡å®ç°DisposableBeanæ¥å£æˆ–ä½¿ç”¨@PreDestroyæ³¨è§£æ¥å®šä¹‰é”€æ¯æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

              • é¦–å…ˆå®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªç±»ï¼š
    
java
Copy
public class MyBean implements InitializingBean, DisposableBean {
    private String message;
    
    public void setMessage(String message) {
        this.message = message;
    }
    
    public String getMessage() {
        return message;
    }
    
    @Override
    public void afterPropertiesSet() throws Exception {
        System.out.println("MyBean initialized.");
    }
    
    @Override
    public void destroy() throws Exception {
        System.out.println("MyBean destroyed.");
    }
}
åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªç±»ä¸­ï¼Œå®šä¹‰äº†ä¸€ä¸ªmessageå±æ€§å’ŒGetter/Setteræ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå®ç°äº†InitializingBeanå’ŒDisposableBeanæ¥å£ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚åœ¨afterPropertiesSet()æ–¹æ³•ä¸­ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºåˆå§‹åŒ–ä¿¡æ¯ï¼›åœ¨destroy()æ–¹æ³•ä¸­ï¼Œè¾“å‡ºé”€æ¯ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚
    
æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œåœ¨Springçš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­é…ç½®Beançš„ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸï¼š

<bean id="myBean" class="com.example.MyBean" init-method="afterPropertiesSet" destroy-method="destroy">

</bean>
åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆå®šä¹‰äº†ä¸€ä¸ªidä¸ºmyBeançš„Beanï¼Œå®ƒçš„ç±»å‹ä¸ºMyBeanã€‚ç„¶åä½¿ç”¨propertyå…ƒç´ æ³¨å…¥äº†ä¸€ä¸ªåä¸ºmessageçš„å±æ€§ï¼Œå®ƒçš„å€¼ä¸º"Hello, World!"ã€‚åŒæ—¶ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨init-methodå±æ€§æŒ‡å®šäº†Beanåˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶è¦è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸ºafterPropertiesSet()ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨destroy-methodå±æ€§æŒ‡å®šäº†Beané”€æ¯æ—¶è¦è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ä¸ºdestroy()ã€‚
    
æœ€åï¼Œè¿è¡Œä»£ç ï¼š
    
java

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        ApplicationContext context = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("applicationContext.xml");
        MyBean myBean = context.getBean("myBean", MyBean.class);
        System.out.println(myBean.getMessage());
        ((AbstractApplicationContext) context).registerShutdownHook();
    }
}

java
Copy
@Component
public class MyBean implements InitializingBean, DisposableBean {
    private String message;
    
    public void setMessage(String message) {
        this.message = message;
    }
    
    public String getMessage() {
        return message;
    }
    
    @PostConstruct
    public void init() {
        System.out.println("MyBean initialized.");
    }
    
    @PreDestroy
    public void destroy() {
        System.out.println("MyBean destroyed.");
    }
}
åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªç±»ä¸­ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨@Componentæ³¨è§£æ ‡è®°äº†å®ƒä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªSpringç»„ä»¶ï¼Œå¹¶å®ç°äº†InitializingBeanå’ŒDisposableBeanæ¥å£ä¸­çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚åœ¨init()æ–¹æ³•ä¸Šä½¿ç”¨@PostConstructæ³¨è§£ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºå®ƒæ˜¯Beanåˆå§‹åŒ–æ—¶è¦è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼›åœ¨destroy()æ–¹æ³•ä¸Šä½¿ç”¨@PreDestroyæ³¨è§£ï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºå®ƒæ˜¯Beané”€æ¯æ—¶è¦è°ƒç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚
    
æ¥ä¸‹æ¥ï¼Œåœ¨Springçš„é…ç½®ç±»ä¸­é…ç½®Beançš„ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸï¼š

@Configuration
@ComponentScan(basePackages = "com.example")
public class AppConfig {
    @Bean(initMethod = "init", destroyMethod = "destroy")
    public MyBean myBean() {
        MyBean bean = new MyBean();
        bean.setMessage("Hello, World!");
        return bean;
    }
}

åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªç±»ä¸­ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨@Serviceæ³¨è§£æ ‡è®°äº†å®ƒä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªSpringç»„ä»¶ã€‚

java

@Aspect
@Component
public class LoggingAspect {
    @Before("execution(* com.example.MessageService.*(..))")
    public void logBefore(JoinPoint joinPoint) {
        System.out.println("Before method execution: " + joinPoint.getSignature().getName());
    }
    
    @AfterReturning(pointcut = "execution(* com.example.MessageService.*(..))", returning = "result")
    public void logAfterReturning(JoinPoint joinPoint, Object result) {
        System.out.println("After method execution: " + joinPoint.getSignature().getName() + ", result: " + result);
    }
    
    @AfterThrowing(pointcut = "execution(* com.example.MessageService.*(..))", throwing = "ex")
    public void logAfterThrowing(JoinPoint joinPoint, Throwable ex) {
        System.out.println("After method execution (exception thrown): " + joinPoint.getSignature().getName() + ", exception: " + ex.getMessage());
    }
}
åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªç±»ä¸­ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨@Aspectæ³¨è§£æ ‡è®°äº†å®ƒä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªåˆ‡é¢ã€‚ç„¶åå®šä¹‰äº†ä¸‰ä¸ªé€šçŸ¥æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯å‰ç½®é€šçŸ¥ã€åç½®é€šçŸ¥å’Œå¼‚å¸¸é€šçŸ¥ã€‚ä½¿ç”¨@Beforeæ³¨è§£æ ‡è®°äº†å‰ç½®é€šçŸ¥æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨@AfterReturningæ³¨è§£æ ‡è®°äº†åç½®é€šçŸ¥æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨@AfterThrowingæ³¨è§£æ ‡è®°äº†å¼‚å¸¸é€šçŸ¥æ–¹æ³•ã€‚åœ¨è¿™äº›æ³¨è§£çš„å‚æ•°ä¸­ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨execution()å‡½æ•°å®šä¹‰äº†åˆ‡å…¥çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå®ƒçš„å‚æ•°æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ‡ç‚¹è¡¨è¾¾å¼ï¼ŒæŒ‡å®šäº†è¦åˆ‡å…¥çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚
    
æœ€åï¼Œåœ¨Mainç±»ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨MessageServiceå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå¹¶è¾“å‡ºæ¶ˆæ¯ï¼š

public class Main {
    public static void main(String[] args) {
        AnnotationConfigApplicationContext context = new AnnotationConfigApplicationContext(LoggingAspect.class, MessageServiceImpl.class);
        MessageService messageService = context.getBean(MessageService.class);
        System.out.println(messageService.getMessage());
        context.close();
    }
}
åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªä»£ç ä¸­ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆåˆ›å»ºäº†ä¸€ä¸ªAnnotationConfigApplicationContextï¼Œä½¿ç”¨å®ƒåŠ è½½äº†LoggingAspectå’ŒMessageServiceImplä¸¤ä¸ªç»„ä»¶ã€‚ç„¶åä»å®¹å™¨ä¸­è·å–äº†ä¸€ä¸ªMessageServiceå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œå¹¶è°ƒç”¨äº†å®ƒçš„getMessage()æ–¹æ³•ã€‚åœ¨è°ƒç”¨è¿‡ç¨‹ä¸­ï¼Œåˆ‡é¢ä¸­å®šä¹‰çš„é€šçŸ¥æ–¹æ³•ä¼šè¢«è‡ªåŠ¨æ‰§è¡Œã€‚æœ€åï¼Œå…³é—­äº†Springå®¹å™¨ã€‚

Copy
class ListNode {
    int val;
    ListNode next;
    ListNode(int val) {
        this.val = val;
        this.next = null;
    }
}
    
ListNode head = new ListNode(1);
head.next = new ListNode(2);

class TreeNode {
    int val;
    TreeNode left;
    TreeNode right;
    TreeNode(int val) {
        this.val = val;
        this.left = null;
        this.right = null;
    }
}

root.left = new TreeNode(2);
root.right = new TreeNode(3);

System.out.println(root.left.val); // è¾“å‡º 2
System.out.println(root.right.val); // è¾“å‡º 3

            • å¸¸ç”¨çš„ç®—æ³•ï¼Œå¦‚æ’åºç®—æ³•ã€æŸ¥æ‰¾ç®—æ³•ã€é€’å½’ç®—æ³•ç­‰ï¼Œä»¥åŠå®ƒä»¬çš„æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦å’Œç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦ã€‚

              • æ’åºç®—æ³•ï¼šå†’æ³¡æ’åºã€é€‰æ‹©æ’åºã€æ’å…¥æ’åºã€å¸Œå°”æ’åºã€å½’å¹¶æ’åºã€å¿«é€Ÿæ’åºç­‰ã€‚æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä»O(n^2)åˆ°O(nlogn)ä¸ç­‰ã€‚
              • æŸ¥æ‰¾ç®—æ³•ï¼šé¡ºåºæŸ¥æ‰¾ã€äºŒåˆ†æŸ¥æ‰¾ã€å“ˆå¸ŒæŸ¥æ‰¾ç­‰ã€‚æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦ä»O(n)åˆ°O(logn)ä¸ç­‰ã€‚

              • åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’ç®—æ³•ï¼šé€šè¿‡å°†åŸé—®é¢˜åˆ†è§£ä¸ºå­é—®é¢˜æ¥è§£å†³é—®é¢˜çš„ç®—æ³•ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå…·æœ‰é‡å å­é—®é¢˜å’Œæœ€ä¼˜å­ç»“æ„æ€§è´¨çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚æ—¶é—´å¤æ‚åº¦å’Œç©ºé—´å¤æ‚åº¦å–å†³äºå­é—®é¢˜çš„ä¸ªæ•°å’Œè§„æ¨¡ã€‚
              • å†’æ³¡æ’åºï¼š
    
java
Copy
void bubbleSort(int[] arr) {
    int n = arr.length;
    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < n - i - 1; j++) {
            if (arr[j] > arr[j + 1]) {
                int temp = arr[j];
                arr[j] = arr[j + 1];
                arr[j + 1] = temp;
            }
        }
    }
}
é€‰æ‹©æ’åºï¼š
    
java
Copy
void selectionSort(int[] arr) {
    int n = arr.length;
    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {
        int minIndex = i;
        for (int j = i + 1; j < n; j++) {
            if (arr[j] < arr[minIndex]) {
                minIndex = j;
            }
        }
        int temp = arr[i];
        arr[i] = arr[minIndex];
        arr[minIndex] = temp;
    }
}
æ’å…¥æ’åºï¼š
    
java
Copy
void insertionSort(int[] arr) {
    int n = arr.length;
    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
        int key = arr[i];
        int j = i - 1;
        while (j >= 0 && arr[j] > key) {
            arr[j + 1] = arr[j];
            j--;
        }
        arr[j + 1] = key;
    }
}
é€’å½’ç®—æ³•ï¼š
    
java
Copy
int fibonacci(int n) {
    if (n == 0) {
        return 0;
    }
    if (n == 1) {
        return 1;
    }
    return fibonacci(n - 1) + fibonacci(n - 2);
}
åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’ç®—æ³•ï¼š
    
java
Copy
int fibonacci(int n) {
    int[] dp = new int[n + 1];
    dp[0] = 0;
    dp[1] = 1;
    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
        dp[i] = dp[i - 1] + dp[i - 2];
    }
    return dp[n];
}

```bash
cluster-enabled yes
cluster-config-file nodes-7000.conf
cluster-node-timeout 5000
appendonly yes
```

7. å¯åŠ¨ Redis Cluster

ä»¥ä¸Šæ˜¯ Redis åœ¨ Linux ç¯å¢ƒä¸‹æŒä¹…åŒ–å’Œä¸»ä»å¤åˆ¶ç­‰é«˜å¯ç”¨æŠ€æœ¯çš„è¯¦ç»†è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚

              • ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯åœ¨ Java ç¯å¢ƒä¸‹å®ç°ç¼“å­˜ç©¿é€ã€ç¼“å­˜é›ªå´©ã€ç¼“å­˜å‡»ç©¿ç­‰ç¼“å­˜å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜çš„ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹ï¼š
    
1. ç¼“å­˜ç©¿é€
    
1.1. å¸ƒéš†è¿‡æ»¤å™¨
    
```java
public class BloomFilter {
    private BitSet bitSet;
    private int size;
    private int hashFunctions;
    
    public BloomFilter(int size, int hashFunctions) {
        this.bitSet = new BitSet(size);
        this.size = size;
        this.hashFunctions = hashFunctions;
    }
    
    public void add(String key) {
        for (int i = 0; i < hashFunctions; i++) {
            int index = hash(key, i) % size;
            bitSet.set(index);
        }
    }
    
    public boolean contains(String key) {
        for (int i = 0; i < hashFunctions; i++) {
            int index = hash(key, i) % size;
            if (!bitSet.get(index)) {
                return false;
            }
        }
        return true;
    }
    
    private int hash(String key, int index) {
        switch (index) {
            case 0:
                return Math.abs(key.hashCode());
            case 1:
                return Math.abs(key.hashCode() * 31);
            case 2:
                return Math.abs(key.hashCode() * 37);
            default:
                return Math.abs(key.hashCode() * 61);
        }
    }
}
```
    
1.2. ç¼“å­˜ç©ºå¯¹è±¡

```java
    private static Map<String, Object> cache = new HashMap<>();

        Object value = cache.get(key);
        if (value == null) {
            if (!cache.containsKey(key)) {
                return null;
            }
            value = queryFromDatabase(key);
            if (value == null) {
                value = new Object(); // ç©ºå¯¹è±¡
            }
            cache.put(key, value);
        }
        return value;
    }
    
    private Object queryFromDatabase(String key) {

    }
}
```

1.3. é™åˆ¶è¯·æ±‚é¢‘ç‡
    
```java
public class CacheService {
    private static Map<String, Object> cache = new HashMap<>();
    private static Map<String, Long> rateLimit = new HashMap<>();
    
    public Object get(String key) {
        // åˆ¤æ–­è¯·æ±‚é¢‘ç‡
        long currentTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
        if (rateLimit.containsKey(key) && currentTime - rateLimit.get(key) < 1000) {
            throw new RuntimeException("Too many requests");
        }
        rateLimit.put(key, currentTime);
    
        Object value = cache.get(key);
        if (value == null) {
            value = queryFromDatabase(key);
            if (value == null) {
                return null;
            }
            cache.put(key, value);
        }
        return value;
    }
    
    private Object queryFromDatabase(String key) {
        // æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®åº“
        return null;
    }
}
```

```java
public class CacheService {
    private static Map<String, Object> cache = new HashMap<>();
    private static Random random = new Random();
    
    public Object get(String key) {
        Object value = cache.get(key);
        if (value == null) {
            value = queryFromDatabase(key);
            if (value == null) {
                return null;
            }
            int expireTime = 60 + random.nextInt(60); // ç¼“å­˜å¤±æ•ˆæ—¶é—´éšæœºåŒ–
            cache.put(key, value, expireTime);
        }
        return value;
    }
    
    private Object queryFromDatabase(String key) {
        // æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®åº“
        return null;
    }
}
```
    
2.2. ä½¿ç”¨åˆ†å¸ƒå¼é”
    
```java
public class CacheService {
    private static Map<String, Object> cache = new HashMap<>();
    private static DistributedLock lock = new DistributedLock();
    
    public Object get(String key) {
        Object value = cache.get(key);
        if (value == null) {
            if (lock.tryLock(key)) {
                try {
                    value = queryFromDatabase(key);
                    if (value == null) {
                        return null;
                    }
                    cache.put(key, value);
                } finally {
                    lock.unlock(key);
                }
            } else {
                // è·å–é”å¤±è´¥ï¼Œç­‰å¾…ä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´åé‡è¯•
                Thread.sleep(100);
                return get(key);
            }
        }
        return value;
    }
    
    private Object queryFromDatabase(String key) {
        // æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®åº“
        return null;
    }
}
```

```javapublic class CacheService {
    private static Map<String, Object> cache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
    
    public Object get(String key) {
        Object value = cache.get(key);
        if (value == null) {
            synchronized (cache) {
                value = cache.get(key);
                if (value == null) {
                    value = queryFromDatabase(key);
                    if (value == null) {
                        return null;
                    }
                    cache.put(key, value);
                }
            }
        }
        return value;
    }
    
    private Object queryFromDatabase(String key) {
        // æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®åº“
        return null;
    }
}
```

3.2. æ°¸ä¸è¿‡æœŸ
    
```java
public class CacheService {
    private static Map<String, Object> cache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
    
    public Object get(String key) {
        Object value = cache.get(key);
        if (value == null) {
            Object lock = new Object();
            synchronized (lock) {
                value = cache.get(key);
                if (value == null) {
                    value = queryFromDatabase(key);
                    if (value == null) {
                        return null;
                    }
                    cache.put(key, value);
                    lock.wait(); // æ°¸ä¸è¿‡æœŸ
                }
            }
        }
        return value;
    }
    
    private Object queryFromDatabase(String key) {
        // æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®åº“
        return null;
    }
}
```
    
ä»¥ä¸Šæ˜¯åœ¨ Java ç¯å¢ƒä¸‹å®ç°ç¼“å­˜ç©¿é€ã€ç¼“å­˜é›ªå´©ã€ç¼“å­˜å‡»ç©¿ç­‰ç¼“å­˜å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜çš„ä»£ç ç¤ºä¾‹ã€‚éœ€è¦æ³¨æ„çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œè¿™äº›ç¤ºä¾‹ä»£ç ä»…ä¾›å‚è€ƒï¼Œå®é™…åº”ç”¨ä¸­è¿˜éœ€è¦æ ¹æ®å…·ä½“ä¸šåŠ¡åœºæ™¯è¿›è¡Œè°ƒæ•´å’Œä¼˜åŒ–ã€‚

            é¢è¯•å®˜ï¼šé‚£ä½ èƒ½å¦ç®€å•ä»‹ç»ä¸€ä¸‹Springæ¡†æ¶çš„åŸç†å’Œå¸¸ç”¨æ³¨è§£ï¼Ÿ
